Material used.Description: CRISPR/Cas9-edited HEK293 cells expressing L1CAM c.358G>A (p.G120R) were used for co-IP experiments.

Readout description.Result Description: The mutant L1CAM (p.G120R) failed to co-precipitate with TSPAN12 compared to wild-type L1CAM, indicating disrupted interaction.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type L1CAM-expressing HEK293 cells were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector-transfected HEK293 cells were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used to compare co-IP signals between mutant and wild-type samples.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Co-IP signal intensity â‰¥ 80% of wild-type control

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Co-IP signal intensity < 50% of wild-type control
